template.subject: Constituent Request: Parliamentary Action on Iran Human Rights Crisis
template.body:
Dear Committee Members,

As a constituent, I am writing to request urgent parliamentary action regarding the human rights crisis in Iran.

Since 28 December 2025:
• Over 51 peaceful protesters have been killed by Iranian security forces
• More than 2,270 people have been arbitrarily detained
• A nationwide internet blackout has been imposed
• Documented use of live ammunition against civilians

I respectfully request that Parliament:

1. Hold an urgent debate on the situation in Iran
2. Support targeted sanctions against officials responsible for human rights abuses under the UK's autonomous Magnitsky-style sanctions regime
3. Summon the Iranian Ambassador to explain the government's actions
4. Call for the immediate release of detained protesters
5. Support efforts to restore internet access in Iran

The United Kingdom has a proud tradition of standing up for human rights globally. I urge you to ensure we live up to that tradition now.

Thank you for your attention to this urgent matter.

Yours faithfully,
A concerned constituent
